Package com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier

Contains classes used for verifying requests sent to your service.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpeechletRequestVerifier
    Verifier for validating the received SpeechletRequests from the devices.
    SpeechletResponseVerifier
    Verifier for validating the SpeechletResponseEnvelope received from the Speechlets.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationIdSpeechletRequestVerifier
    Verifies whether or not individual application IDs are supported by the service.
    CardSpeechletResponseVerifier
    A SpeechletResponseVerifier to verify the Card returned by SpeechletResponseEnvelope.
    OutputSpeechSpeechletResponseVerifier
    A SpeechletResponseVerifier to verify the size of the OutputSpeech returned in SpeechletResponseEnvelope.
    ResponseSizeSpeechletResponseVerifier
    A SpeechletResponseVerifier to verify the size of the complete response returned in SpeechletResponseEnvelope.
    TimestampSpeechletRequestVerifier
    Verifies whether or not timestamps are valid within a certain tolerance.

Package com.amazon.speech.speechlet.verifier Description

Contains classes used for verifying requests sent to your service.
